body.name: Apevia ATX-JP1000 Jupiter 1000W 80 Plus Bronze Certified Active PFC ATX Gaming Power Supply, Support Dual/Quad Core CPUs, SLI/Crossfire/Haswell
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 2 mins
features: Apevia ATX-JP1000 Jupiter 1000W 80 Plus Bronze Certified Active PFC ATX Gaming Power Supply.
Connectors: 1 x 20/24pin Main Power, 1 x P8(4+4P) ESP 12V, 4 x SATA + 4 x 8(6+2)pin PCI-E, 4 x Peripheral, 1 x Floppy. Supports Single 12V Output for Higher Power Usage
Supports ATX 12V 2.3 Version. Supports Dual/Quad Core CPUs. Supports SLI/Crossfire/ Haswell. Large Japanese Made Capacitor. All Sleeved Cables.
Double Forward Converter Design. Heavy Duty Protections: Short-Circuit/ Over-Voltage/ Over-Power/ Under-Voltage Protections
body.description: Apevia Jupiter series power supply is 80 Plus Bronze certified. It offers spellbinding performance for high-end PC gaming rigs. This versatile PS supports NVidia SLI, as well as ATI crossfire and Haswell. The Jupiter series is also ideal for dual and quad core CPUs. The thermally controlled automatic sensor regulates fan speed while reducing noise. And a powerful 135mm black fan delivers outstanding ventilation. For safety, do not overload, abuse or modify the power supply unit. Use of this unit for Bitcoin Mining is not suggested since it will shorten the life and cause failures of power supply. Use for mining purposes is not covered by warranty.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 208 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value compared to other sites
reviews.reviewText: Shipped quickly (next day), the box was undamaged, and shipped in a specialty box instead of normal Amazon boxes. Set up from a 800w to 1000w was simple, just plug and play only took an hour mostly due to restricted space and cable management, ran a few robust games with a tower with RGB and Nividia 3080 Ti and had no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great power supply outstanding service
reviews.reviewText: This product installed easily and worked well. When my motherboard died and I just suspected that the power supply might be the cause Apevia promptly sent a new replacement. I would definitely buy this product again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I've had issues since the first month with this PSU
reviews.reviewText: Fans on PSU started making a horrible screeching sound, also my pc has shut off randomly since installing. Tested another PSU same wattage different brand and had zero issues. I have had this for less than 6 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works, quiet, efficient.
reviews.reviewText: You may notice an empty hole in your ATX connector. This is actually normal, works fine without it.Much quieter then the 750 gold I was using before and if I understand correctly with a load of 650w the 1000w bronze is actually going to draw less power than the 750w gold beacuse the draw is closer to the halfway point of it's rating and that's how the 80/90 ratings are benchmarked. The "80/90+% efficiency" they mark is only at that halfway point with efficiency slipping away in ether direction from there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have bought several Jupiter power supply units before and I can say they are of good quality and have good durability. They do not emit very much noise either which is a big plus. The only issue I ever had was the fan bearing on my first one started to go bad after several years of use, otherwise zero issues. Connects all the stuff I need, long enough for full tower cases and matches all the modern connectors like PCI-E while keeping the power connector for older plugs and HDD's. Overall good product with good value.TL:DRGood quality, long lasting and great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved the day! Same Day Amazon Delivery
reviews.reviewText: Was in a pinch the old power supply went out and I had no time to run to the local shop. Hopped on Amazon and boom, same day delivery and this was a great price! Great device, the fan is super quiet, and the cables are excellent with tons of options. I have 3 drives in there plus a power hog video card and I still had whole strips left with nothing attached. Great box and great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excelente Vendedor y Empresa
reviews.reviewText: Estoy totalmente satisfecho con la Empresa "Apevia". Pensamos algunas veces que las marcas no tan reconocidas pueden presentar inconvenientes en Calidad o Temas de Garantia, pero realmente esta fue excelente. Presente un inconveniente con una unidad (Apevia Jupiter 1000W 80 Plus Bronce), por temas de sobrecarga, y le empresa muy compromida me genero el reemplazo de mi unidad por otra de Mejor Calidad (Apevia Prestige 1000w 80 Plus Gold) en compesacion. Excelente Servicio al Cliente y muy serios con los temas de Garantia. Recomendado

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sounds like a really messed up cricket in there. Gonna need to buy a different one. It took about a month to start happening, just when the return window ends... suspicious.

Después de tres días de uso va de maravilla! El arnés trae una protección que se siente un poco rígida y de una calidad moderada pero seguro le ayuda para aislar el calor, pero por el precio es muy buen producto! Recomendado!
